mtdp.title: Halo 3 - Xenia
mtdp.heading: Welcome to Xenia!
mtdp.body: Jump into Matchmaking and start climbing the ranks, and... pardon our dust!|r|n|r|nWe're still getting things ready and this project will be evolving over a long time, so stay tuned for updates and new playlists!|r|n|r|nGLHF! - @craftycodie|r|n|r|nP.S. you're playing on the campaign disc, make sure you've got those Free DLC maps installed too :)
